content_html: Bagmati, Sept 17: The Speaker of the Bagmati Province Assembly, Bhuvan Kumar Pathak, has resigned from his post today. He has submitted his resignation letter to the Deputy Speaker, Apsara Chapagain. Speaker Pathak has mentioned in his resignation letter that he has tendered resignation from his post in accordance wi
